website_summaries.verdict: This GoPro accessory kit includes 46 pieces that are expertly constructed and deliver long-lasting results for your filming adventures.
pros: Includes a carrying case that offers plenty of space and is shockproof
Wrist strap enables you to position your GoPro at any angle
Suction cup mount instantly attaches to a surfboard, car windshield or other surfaces
Convenient floating hand grip mount reduces the risk you will lose your GoPro during water activities
cons: Chest mount does not include a J-hook buckle
Plastic mount pieces leave much to be desired

customer_reviews.title: its alright, it will get the job done when you first buy an action cam
customer_reviews.text: Its an ok assortment of accessories. The clip systems is fairly rigid, but also difficult to use. The floating yellow bobber never made sense to me, as their are wrist straps out there of neoprene that float and are more effective, but it works. The strap sets are thin and cheap, made for a small person and very little motion, but it will work until you decide to upgrade to a quality set. The case is a little small for my taste, it held everything, but could use a zip up liner for the cover instead of the net, so everything doesnt fall out when you open the case.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap parts and poor QC
customer_reviews.text: Cheap items. You get what you pay for at the low price. Received my item and it appeared to have either been returned by another customer or poor QC with how the parts were placed in the kit. The foam mold is completely unusable due to being malformed from the parts being carelessly thrown into it and zipped closed. Very poorly manufactured parts, cheap plastic. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NewarkEMT

customer_reviews.title: Lost in the Ocean
customer_reviews.text: Has a lot of good attachments. The case itself is also really nice for holding the action camera and your most used accessories. Only problem is that the 3M sticker wasn't strong enough and the floating sponge failed to do its job so I lost my brand new camera in the ocean the first time I used it. I had my camera attached to my surfboard using the Curved Surface Mount with the Release Buckle Mount. I also had the Floating Sponge on my camera incase it came off. It took 2 waves just fine but tore off on the third. We looked for 2 hours for my camera but never saw any sign of it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kbf

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I received this product today after only ordering it YEATERDAY! I can't say how in love I am with all of the pieces. I use my GoPro at a lot of different events and for a lot of different activities. This pack is perfect for just about EVERYTHING. And on top of it the price is amazing. I couldn't have asked for anything better.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Lopez

customer_reviews.title: GoPro Accessories
customer_reviews.text: I think the GoPro accessories kit was reasonable and a real benefit for having multiple attachments for the GoPro camera, I would give 5 stars except for two things that I would have liked. One it came with no instructions and some parts I don't know how to use. Two the case should be more uniform to contain all items in a orderly fashion.
customer_reviews.author: james duncan

customer_reviews.title: Moderately disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: For the price its not a bad kit. All items combined would add up to well over the price of this. However the suction mount arrived with a crack in the suction lever and is rendered useless due to that. One other area of complaint is that all the items are thrown into it in an unorganized manner then zipped shut. The foam in the case is squished and all rigidity was lost. I'm sure I just received a bad suction mount and they wouldn't all be like this but if you're ordering this one because of the case be aware that it may not be as it seems in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Not for smaller go pros.....
customer_reviews.text: Item only works for Hero 5 Black or larger style pro go cameras, not the smaller cameras without the back displays. Allows for WAY to much rattling around in case. Items were recklessly packed in case and some were missing. Perhaps a return that someone kept parts from and Amazon warehouse didn't catch. Not necessarily the seller's fault. Protective foam is of poor quality and design barely fitting in case. Good for a cheap item but if you want long lasting and durability perhaps spend a little more and look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Laura K.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of accesories for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Looked around for some original accesories for my Go pro Hero 5 and the prices where on the high side, found this kit on amazon, and for the money it comes with a lot of accesories for use of any go pro! Small tri-pod, head band starp, body strap for a dog, etc.... I bought it mainly for the suction cup accesory so i could hang from the side of my car when racing. My biggest complaint was the suction cup accesary is cheap, mine doesnt stick to items very well and the plastic tightening screw stripped on it. Other than that not bad for what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: wsamot

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! As it says, its only for the GoPro mount. If, like me, you want to mount a camera with a regular 1/4" thread, you'll also want something like this: Odly, the selfie stick does have a 1/4" camera mount. I broke the selfie stick by pushing on the top of the camera to retract it. My own fault, but just beware that the plastic head on the selfie stick wont take much abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Not for GOPRO Session!  Bad fit, missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT for GoPro Session. The camera doesn't fit well in the case - the cutouts are too big so you need a separate case to adequate secure and protect camera. Also, the kit does NOT include a proper mount for chest harness. Then all the crap was packaged in the case so the foam is all squished and deformed. Like the other reviews, there is a handful of stuff that have unknown purpose and seem like a bunch of pieces to look like a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my husband for Christmas. LOL I think he became overwhelmed when he starting digging into everything that came with this kit. The funny thing is now, I need to buy him another case for all of the stuff that will not fit into this case when the camera is in it. This is pretty cool though, there are things in the kit that will encourage him to explore even more now. I also like the fact that the case is hard, gives me a little piece of mind that his GoPro is safe.
customer_reviews.author: Ami Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this accessory kit mostly for the chest strap for my Gopro. I haven't used it yet but will soon. First though, I am a beginner with the Gopro, so instructions in the accessory kit would have been nice. Secondly, the chest strap ... the right shoulder strap is twisted. Both ends of the strap are stitched together so it is impossible to unfasten it to untwist it without having to cut the strap. The product itself seems to be good but quality control could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good - selfie stick needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: So far most things are good. The only thing that I don't like is the selfie stick. It's not very strong. It has a hard time holding the go pro up at its full length. But it is very long. I also took it into the water to rest it out. It is all rusted now so I do not recommend taking it in water. I just bought a more durable one. But this package is pretty good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Coolkat

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a smoke shop!
customer_reviews.text: This product came and smelled like it was straight out of a snake shop. I couldn’t even keep it in my kitchen when I opened it up. Then I tried to take with me to use and it smelled my car up so bad I had to take in with me. It absolu wreaks! I don’t even know how it’s possible, but where this came from must be pumping out tobacco use like no ones business. So gross. I am going to try to return.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Not for lazy people
customer_reviews.text: Was very unhappy that there were no instructions or pictures as to how all the parts worked and what they did.. I will eventually figure it out, but I was hoping it would be turn key and ready to go out of the box with instructions. I still have not used any of it because every time I look at all those pieces I just sigh and say "I'll figure it out later". Instructions were made for people like me that are mechanically challenged. (and somewhat lazy).
customer_reviews.author: lynn Campbell

customer_reviews.title: ... little concerned that I bought a bunch of cheap crap because of the price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned that I bought a bunch of cheap crap because of the price, but I was definitely WRONG!!! This is really good stuff!! We had purchased chest straps for the GO PRO before and they always broke and this one is really nice! We used the chest strap for a week on vacation and brought it home in one piece. My kids were so excited with all the added extras. Yes, its true there are no instructions as to what everything is, but my kids were able to figure it out. Very impressed with this kit!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya R.

customer_reviews.title: The worst part is that the entire contents smelled of smoke
customer_reviews.text: When I got this the contents of the package were all thrown about the inside of the case. The worst part is that the entire contents smelled of smoke. I can only imagine where this came from. I wish Amazon would take more care to check quality on items sold on this site.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Wife and kids got me a Vivitar Action Cam for Christmas, so the kids and I can start a vlog. I ordered this to play around with, and everything seems to work great so far. Takes some slight figuring out as far as what screws and brackets go where, but everything works well. Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Discepola III

customer_reviews.title: Chemical plant
customer_reviews.text: The title says it comes with a tripod, it does not. The whole thing smells like a chemical plant even after a week of airing it out. At least the accessories work but it's going back because of the smell and I need a tripod.
customer_reviews.author: ruffdeezy

customer_reviews.title: So many options
customer_reviews.text: Package has so many options for mounting GoPro unit for action use. The number of mounts can be a bit overwhelming but good have so many mounting options available. Mounts I used attach and hold camera securely in place during use. Can be used with other GoPro-like electronics that use same mounting system as well.
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: Way better Chinese junk than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: The cheapest GoPro accessory junk I could find.... and it’s exactly what I wanted and better than expected. All the mounts work without issue, there’s a TON of options and accessories included, and I’ve had no issue with anything over dozens of kayaking and biking trips.
customer_reviews.author: thebarzeen

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy. I bought this for my husband for ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. I bought this for my husband for what I think was a steal, it came with so many accessories and a nice vase to put it all in. I definitely recommend this kit. It was well worth the money considering if you try to buy a selfie sit for go pro your looking at spending 30 bucks or more. This was a great deal. And it all worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This kit has so many accessories that are so helpful. The one we use most is the yellow handle that floats. Even when we dont use it to take video or photos, our kids likes playing with it in the water. I like that everything comes in a nice case and it has so many things we have yet to really use all of it. I think this product is really great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Junky
customer_reviews.text: The one item I really wanted - the suction cup mount is in usable. Cheap, no working junk. Rest of the stuff is ok,
customer_reviews.author: jim napoleoni

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit came with everything that was advertised. All items worked. I mostly use the chest mount, head mount, selfie stick and floating selfie stick. I'm pleased with this kit, its case and all the mounting options it offers.
customer_reviews.author: ski

customer_reviews.title: Buy the real deal, not this.
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything. I haven't used everything yet. Not great quality, I won't be using it for anything serious. The tripod won't attach properly and the retractable stick is VERY unstable and spins around with the weight of the GoPro. I guess it is what to expect for this price. Just, buy the real things, I will now buy the real deal to do anything serious.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: But the chesty and head mounts are great. Hard to mess those up
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Just don't trust it to do too much. For example, the suction cup is worthless. But the chesty and head mounts are great. Hard to mess those up. The selfie stick and clip mounts get the job done as much as you can ask for. Haven't tested the floaty but I wouldn't trust it in open water based on how the suction cup worked. I would still recommend this kit because of all the mounts and screws that would otherwise cost you a ton through GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All the GoPro attachments!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend. He really enjoyed it and has used many of the pieces already. The amount of attachments for the price is crazy! (In a good way) The only thing I wish it came with was an explanation for all the pieces. Many of them we kind of just guessed what it was supposed to be. It comes with all the necessitates though and in a compact, good quality case.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: A box-o-stuff
customer_reviews.text: There's a lot of "stuff" in this pack. the plastic parts are just that. Plastic. I know. I know most of it will not last very long. But I needed something fast for our vaca. And for $20 bucks delivered next day, I can breath a lil easier know that some of the stuff in the kit I will be able to use... with caution ;)
customer_reviews.author: murkat

customer_reviews.title: Some of the mounts are not great, but for the price it's worth picking up
customer_reviews.text: Not set to get you started with a lot of GoPro mounts. Some of the mounts are not great, but for the price it's worth picking up. I'm giving it 4 stars because it doesn't come with Vertical Surface J-Hooks, these are needed for the head strap. Also the Selfie stick is not very sturdy with the GoPro mounted on it, does not stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Les Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price...mostly
customer_reviews.text: Overall a decent kit with ALOT of adapters/mounts for the price. The foam in the case was deformed, and the yellow float handle had a pin hole somewhere in it and filled with water on a scuba dive at a depth of 35 feet. That being said this whole kit was the cost of one GoPro branded floating handles.
customer_reviews.author: RayJ

customer_reviews.title: Most of the kit is usable in less-than-extreme conditions.
customer_reviews.text: Some items are similar quality to what you'd pay a lot more for, while other things are throwaways (for example, I'd never trust my $300 GoPro on the terrible suction mount that is in this kit). The majority of what you get is usable, and for the price it's a fantastic starter kit. Just be wary of that suction cup.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It OK. For price u pick.
customer_reviews.text: I try to put suction cup to windshield. But the cup won't suck on it. And the tird strip quality cheap. Not smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Simon  li

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: Everything feels flimsy and the case has random cut outs that don't fit anything properly. My bendy-tripod broke the first time I used it. Most the connectors don't hold the camera still. Everything comes loose with little effort. I wouldn't trust my camera to these accessories. It will fall off and get lost or damaged.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Pieces came broken
customer_reviews.text: When I opened this 2 of the different accessories were broken, along with the foam being messed up. I am returning this immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen W

customer_reviews.title: Could use some improvements, but a good price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a good deal. There were a few things that I didn't like. The octopus tripod plastic ball joint broke the first day. Also, everything was crammed into the carry case. That meant that the foam dividers and the floaty sponge were deformed.
customer_reviews.author: Wildcat

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: love this kit! Use it for barrel racing on my son all the time and it stays very well on his helmet!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Moss

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: Holy used some of the products in the box. Wish they had some instruction on how to use some of the things or set them up. Took me awhile to get the hang of this. Never used a go pro and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: eusebio correa

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment for most purposes
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment for most purposes. I use the wrist band over a mechanics glove that has a velcro band to help prevent it from sliding down the sides of the wrist. Head band works great. The bottom middle clip mount works good for clipping onto the center of my lifejacket straps, however the spring part has now broken.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: For the price how can you beat this. I ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price how can you beat this. I don't know if I would trust suctioning to the outside of my car with these. I use a lot of the different accessories all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy T

customer_reviews.title: Great price great product many of options really a good ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price great product many of options really a good day overall my only complaint is that many of the screws that hold your GoPro or other unit in place or come up short and don't meet the threads in addition to that I've had two of them crack for being what I assume is faulty or cheap material plastic but overall it's a great price great product
customer_reviews.author: Tyler J Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Try it out
customer_reviews.text: It's a good kit to find out what you use for cheap but it's not good enough quality to keep up with a GoPro. My selfie stick broke after a couple months. And all the screws are getting rusty. But I still give it 5 stars because it held up for its cheapness. I wasn't planning on all this stuff lasting forever and now I'll drop a little extra money on the mounts that I actually used often.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Good collection of tools
customer_reviews.text: Great collection of tools. Durability is yet to be tested but the versatility that it provides is great. The selfie stick thing doesn’t seem that will last long.
customer_reviews.author: FranciscoV

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: Kit has everything you need. used on our trip to Maui and used under water and above as well as many waterfall hikes. Chest mount, headset, Hat clamp and wrist mounts were used the most. Did not find to be cheaply made as other reviews have said. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment for the GoPro Hero 4 Black!
customer_reviews.text: What else is there to say other than it comes with all of the attachments you see and they work perfect. So far I've tired the underwater buoy when we went to Jumping Rock and it worked better than i expected. I saw a girl with her GoPro without a float attachment or a buoy like I had. Once i saw the girl looking for her GoPro at the bottom of water that was 30 feet down, I was glad that I bought this accessory kit. Even though she only lost the 99 dollar GoPro is still would make me mad. This a great investment if you have the 500 GoPro Black like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Basic and smelly!
customer_reviews.text: Very basic kit but still useful. The tools are cheap but hey, you get what you pay for! The box had a weird, chemical-like smell that I later realized was the foam mat that sorted everything out. I recommend this kit to anyone with low standards or beginners that aren't sure about which accessories to splurge on just yet.
customer_reviews.author: Yana Dawson

customer_reviews.title: The way everything was put into the box was like someone just threw everything in there
customer_reviews.text: 3 Stars is me being fair here, the product quality is fairly cheap feeling (obviously for the price what do you expect). The way everything was put into the box was like someone just threw everything in there, zipped it up and called it a day. For the most part, I don’t even think any of these things actually have a designated spot for them, just kind of kit them where they do and that’s that.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Staz

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take on vacation to Punta Cana. The case made it very easy to keep up with everything. We were able use several attachments in the ocean, and in dune buggies. Well worth the price! Seem to be same quality as name brand accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Joey And Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for everything you get
customer_reviews.text: Great price for everything you get. I mainly got this for the chest mount for downhill biking. Used it over the weekend going off some pretty large jumps and the go-pro never shifted and stayed tight for a full day of riding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beyond impressed with quality and value
customer_reviews.text: So many items I still haven’t even touched! There are a great amount of products that come in this bag. Does have a small odor of chemicals but for the price you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Some accessories are AWESOME! Others are meh. The selfie stick is kind of useless unless you have a smart remote. Don't take it underwater! The yellow floater, the various mounts, and the straps are the best products! Could add a few more fasteners and sticky pads! Difficult to organize all the parts into the case so they will fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B.

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough
customer_reviews.text: Some of the items were not good enough. They broke easily.
customer_reviews.author: ogrodrummer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money but....
customer_reviews.text: Everything fit my GoPro 3+ Black with exception of maybe two or three pieces... I gave it 3-stars only because there are no instructions in the box; the orange cube noted in the picture was smashed and can not get its shape back so it pretty much useless; and because the body harness for the GoPro would not fit a very large person (250lbs +)... Other than that, totally worth the money if your average size and don't care about instructions...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some of the stuff in this package are good but I won't trust the suction cups at all
customer_reviews.text: Some of the stuff in this package are good but I won't trust the suction cups at all. They seem cheap. My GoPro fell off my car but luckily it was tied down on my side mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: scotty

customer_reviews.title: Great Item for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great kit for the price! There was one piece that didn't have a defined 'screw hole' but that was fixed after some force and fidgeting. We used this for our trip to Key West & The Bahamas! Truly perfect when you need the Accessories for your GoPro without the heft price sticker.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: I opened the case and the products were everywhere. ...
customer_reviews.text: I opened the case and the products were everywhere. Nothing has a “spot” in the case, it’s just wherever you can pack it all in. There also was no instructions so we had to just figure out what each piece was for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product obviously is not of the same quality as ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product obviously is not of the same quality as the original gopro products, but for the price it is very well
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Obando Madrigal

customer_reviews.title: It's very complete and very helpful if you want various shooting angles
customer_reviews.text: It has it all and the price is good. Advice! Use GoPro screws and mount. You must secure your camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Prado

customer_reviews.title: great starter package
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use all the accessories yet but am very happy with this purchase. So far the only issue I have is with the mono pole (selfie stick), it is not tight at the end so the gopro gets a little top heavy and swivels when you don't want it to. So far definitely is worth the money . I am new to this and feel this is a great starter package.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela P

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This pack of accessories all worked perfectly for my GoPro. There are some things I feel I will never use but you never know when you might need something. Low price and lot of good quality items. Recommended for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amer

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Decent purchase. When it arrived it was all mixed up and didn't have any information about which piece is for what; or how to actually attach most of them to the GoPro. We tried the chest piece for a motorcycle ride in St. Maarten and I ended up just taking it off and holding it because the attachment kept falling and faced the gas tank the whole time. Seems of ok quality for what I paid. Will probably try a better brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accessories fit great,  storage case leaves a lot desired
customer_reviews.text: Product is just as described. Very well constructed accessories and fit nice and snug on my hero3+. Gave 4 starts instead of 5 because the storage case leaves a lot to be desired. The internal foam is loose and everything falls around and out when opening the case. Would gladly give 5 stars if the storage case was higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan I.

customer_reviews.title: Funny smell, great products for a low price!
customer_reviews.text: So many accessories at an AMAZING price! Took me a minute to figure out what some of them were for, and I primarily only use a few of them. The products have a strange chemically smell, but they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Works grate
customer_reviews.text: So far what I have used works grate. Hooked the chest strap up to my niece on Easter and record her finding Easter egg. I have used the hat strap when I was out shooting my bow and that worked grate. Still working on the rest of the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It came like the one on the picture but it was packed ...
customer_reviews.text: It came like the one on the picture but it was packed like it was being rushed. And I wonder why the head strap and the chest strap never came in a plastic, maybe it was returned? but I got my moneys worth anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a very disappointing buy. Very cheaply made. Had a horrible odor. Returned it the day it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: nahhhh
customer_reviews.text: Quality was poor , in our opinion, parts broke quickly and didn't fit camera well at all
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and lots of great tools for the GoPro
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and lots of great tools for the GoPro! The bag is nicer than expected and the foam insert is very handy. Looking forward to putting them all to use!
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysLearning

customer_reviews.title: Good place to start
customer_reviews.text: Lots of different items to choose from. This would be a good kit to sample GoPro accessories. From there you can decide which to purchase of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dubya D

customer_reviews.title: Varieties of affordable and durable go pro accessories. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Varieties of affordable and durable go pro accessories. I commonly use the head strap and chest strap, All accessories fit snugly on my equipment. This package is a must-have. You should definitely buy these.
customer_reviews.author: mark-made

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product.... EXCEPT that the wrist band with the lock for the camera is not good... got into the ocean with it and the camera fell into the water.. so i had to buy new camera :(.
customer_reviews.author: Idan Mimran

customer_reviews.title: More than happy with this kit
customer_reviews.text: More than happy with this kit, excellent for the price, if you go to Best buy, something like this is about $60. The case is big enough to keep other accessories from when you got the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jags1021

customer_reviews.title: Good kit for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Perfect kit for beginners. Has all the parts and gadgets you’ll need for any excursion.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Great Setup for GoPro!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great GoPro kit! Comes with a bunch of stuff that you will actually use. The stick isn’t the best of quality, but everything else is great! A good buy for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Very good price for the amount of accessories received
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend and he loves it. Very good price for the amount of accessories received. Definitely would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want to use the chest mount (important piece doesn't come with it)
customer_reviews.text: I've bought to use the chest mount but it's useless without a Jhook. A simple piece that doesn't come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome service and quality but no instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great service. I received my package 2 days early. The quality is superb. The only thing that would have been nice would have been a sheet or pamphlet on how to use the materials in the way to obtain optimum results. There were no instructions or descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Barricklow

customer_reviews.title: everything I have used so far is okay except the ...
customer_reviews.text: everything I have used so far is okay except the head gear. It wont stay on no matter how I adjust it and it was actually one of the main reasons I got the kit. I will be hiking a lot and the head gear would have come in really handy but I can't use it so will have to improvise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Very universal. I feared it wouldn't fit my off brand action camera, and it fits perfectly! I just need to figure out what every little piece is for (shouldn't be too hard once I apply myself)
customer_reviews.author: Shay Zell

customer_reviews.title: I think the variety of pieces included in the kit is great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This kit is ok for the price, but it feels cheap. I'm concerned some of the pieces will break when I use them. I'm not using my GoPro for heavy impact sports, so I'm not concerned that these accessories will damage my camera, but if I was I would be very concerned. Also, the tripod that came in the kit is different from the one shown in the picture. I think the variety of pieces included in the kit is great for beginners, but next time I will invest in better quality items.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Most of the included items are good and the case is helpful
customer_reviews.text: Most of the included items are good and the case is helpful. However, the selfie stick that is included is for a typical camera or digital camera, not a GoPro. It simply does not have the GoPro attachment fixture. I asked the seller to send me the right one, but they just offered a 25% discount. Seller - provide the items that you advertise and don't waste our time.
customer_reviews.author: CA Lawyer 07

customer_reviews.title: Everything looks great and very functional
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks great and very functional. Only drawback is in New to Go Pro and wish there was a picture identifying what some parts are and how they are intended to be used. Some are self explanatory but others ... Lets just say it will take some time to figure them out.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Sperry

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love shooting video with my GoPro and this kit was perfect for me. I didn't want to spend all that money for original accessories so this kit the trick. The accessories I used the most are the bike mount and the water mount. I did not like the the carry case because the foam inside is not attached and does not keep the items inside organized (They move round).
customer_reviews.author: Fonsina

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything described. So far I've used the windshield mount, tripod, and selfie stick. It seems to be of decent quality and gets the job done. All the products in the bag actually seem of decent quality. Much better than paying so much for the go pro equivalent. I was at first skeptical but was presently surprised. I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: ameliemarie

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Several of the items broke shortly after use. The tri-pod and selfie-stick are very delicate. The head-strap and body-strap work very well. In general, the plastic items don't last long.
customer_reviews.author: stillwater2332

customer_reviews.title: Great kit! The kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Great kit! The kids love it, but haven't quite figured all of it out yet. There are two or three attachments in here that, alone, make the price well worth it, much less all of the other cool parts. I love that it has a case and they can keep all their little parts in the case.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyV

customer_reviews.title: ... Clip" which is necessary for the products I needed like the head and chest straps
customer_reviews.text: Did not include the "J Clip" which is necessary for the products I needed like the head and chest straps. Had to order that separately. It should have been in this bunch.
customer_reviews.author: D. Frymier

customer_reviews.title: A lot of variety for the price, it's not ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot of variety for the price, it's not as well made as the GoPro brand pieces but it gets the job done. Some fitment issues with the quick release parts but I made it work with a quick bit of sanding.
customer_reviews.author: Brianfmeister

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: BOLTS TOO SHORT!!! NONE OF THEM WERE LONG ENOUGH TO HOLD THE CLAMPS SECURELY!!! WOULD HAVE BEEN A GREAT SET WITH LOTS OF COOLS ATTACHMENTS IF ONLY THE BOLTS WERE A FRACTION LONGER! ARRIVED FAST AND APPEARS TO TO BE MADE OF GOOD QUALITY EXCEPT FOR THE BOLT ISSUE. RETURNED AND SORELY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Smiles

customer_reviews.title: But I must say I am very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I really went in with a open mind when I placed this order.. I thought it would be very cheap and truly not work right. But I must say I am very happy with the product.. I have since used many of the product in this for my son dirt bike and for hunting and I am very very happy..
customer_reviews.author: Moose32

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. I bought this for the water accessories
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. I bought this for the water accessories, but everything in the kit is cool and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You'll be surprised how great this is...
customer_reviews.text: I really was expecting something good but not great when I order this. But I have to say how wrong I was. It's a great buy if you are starting using this kind of action cameras this kit it's great. It have everything you need to start recording your activities with great quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with the quality of the accessories contained in the kit. I think there is an accessory included for any application. As others have mentioned, it would be handy to have printed instructions on the proper application of some of the accessories. The case is sturdy enough to keep my camera safe, however, if I were designing the case, I would have put the handle on the same side as the opening. I don't like the zipper side down when carrying the case.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality plastic very cheap some of the accessories broke while I was trying it on me/ Baja calidad de material algunos de Los articulos se rompieron cuando Los estaba examinando
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit before for myself. It's a great beginner kit for every need you can think of . Like it so much I got another for my dad for Xmass . He's a big time hunter, fisherman , hiking ,camping , kayaking nut ! This kit should have enough mouts to keep him happy !
customer_reviews.author: Kelp eater

customer_reviews.title: however for the price/benefit it is an amazing pack for your gopro every mount works amazingly good
customer_reviews.text: well on the down side once I pruchased this item it went down for 3 or 4 USD. however for the price/benefit it is an amazing pack for your gopro every mount works amazingly good. other down side is the floating sticker came out in bad conditions, however i dont need it but just take in mind
customer_reviews.author: Andres Avila

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mounts
customer_reviews.text: Good quality mounts! Some people have complained that it's hard to figure out what mount is what. It's really not that hard. The case is big but it ripped the first night I had it. I didn't buy this set for the case so I don't mind. I was really conflicted as to what set to buy but I'm glad I got this one.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works well with my GoPro Hero 4 Black edition and is much cheaper than the GoPro brand
customer_reviews.author: Jonce Scheffel

customer_reviews.title: Just Average Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've added the multiple accessories to my action camera collection, however the octopus tripod is a cheap and poorly made. It snapped the very first time I tried to bend the legs.
customer_reviews.author: WP13

customer_reviews.title: most of the stuff is great, but the selfy stick and a couple other things were broken.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that It came with so much eaquitment, but some of it was broken.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

product_meta.title: Action Camera Accessories Kit for GoPro Hero 7 6 5 4 3+ Session Accessory Bundle Set for Action Camera SJ4000 SJ5000 SJ6000 Xiaomi Yi Handle+Head Strap+Chest Strap+Carrying Case for Christmas
product_meta.description:
Compatible with: GoPro Hero Series Sj4000 Sj4000 plus Sj5000 Sj6000 Amkov XiaoMi Yi AMK 5000 AMK 5000S Dazzne P2 Dazzne P3 EKEN H9 FIREFLY 5S FIREFLY 6S GitUp Git1 2 Isaw Mobius Polaroid Cube SJ7000 SJCAM 4000 plus SJCAM 5000 plus SJCAM M10 SJCAM M10 Plus Soocoo C10 Soocoo S60 and all other action cameras 

Components and Features: 
1*Selfie stick/Handheld Monopod. Maximum length up to 1.1m 
1*Floating Hand Grip. Avoid losing your camera in water sports 
1*Carrying case. Large Size. Shockproof. Waterproof 
1*Chest Harness. Comfortably-adjustable design 
5*Handlebar / Seatpost / Pole Mount. Perfect for Bicycling, Mountain Biking 
1*Flat-Surface Mounts 
8*Long screw 
1*360 Rotation Clip. Quick clip and remove 
1*Tripod Mount Adapter 
2*3M sticker. Fix camera on curved and flat surface 
1*Black Buckle Basic 
1*Nylon Wrist Strap. Fix your bluetooth controller 
1*Head strip. Waterproof 
1*Suction cup mount. Keep the contact surface clean and flat when using 
1*360 Rotation Wrist Strap. Adjust freely 
1*Floating Sponge. Perfect for Surfing 
12*Anti-fog inserts. Reusable 
1*Vented Helmet Strap. Durable nylon strap 
1*Insurance Tether Strap. Further secure camera

Free gift for you: 
1 * Soft Digits Glasses Cleaning cloth 

Notice: 
*The Action camera and bluetooth controller showed in the pictures are not included in the kit 
*Pls using Floating Handle in water sports to avoid losing your camera 
*An electronic instruction is prepared. Anyone needs it, please contact and we will send it as soon as possible. 

Seller Warranty: 
30-Day Money Back Guarantee 
Fast Shipping from Amazon warehouse 
Under 24 hours friendly customer service
feature_bullets: 【FLOATING HANDLE + LONG SCREW】 - Mainly Applied to Water Sports. Brightly yellow color makes camera easily to be found and Avoids Losing, Dropping. NOTE: The Set must be Used in Water Sports!
【Carrying Case】- Large Size&Shockproof. It's very convenient to keep all accessories and your camera together. A necessity for traveling and outdoor sports.
【Suction Cup Mount】- Attached to any smooth surfaces firmly with super suction power, such as surfboard, skiing board, ceramic surfaces, car windshield, plate glass door, car window and roof etc.

【Various Straps】- 360-degree Rotation Wrist Strap with a screw fix your GoPro on the wrist,the angle can be adjusted freely;Flexible Chest Harness is used to equip your action camera comfortably; Vented Helmet Strap helps to attach camera on the forehead, which provides a wider angle and horizon.
【Compatible with】- GoPro Hero 5 4 3+ 3 2 1 Black Silver SJ4000/ SJ5000/ SJ6000, also for SJCAM SJ4000 5000 6000 7000 Xiaomi Yi, Apeman DBPOWER Lightdow WiMiUS Rollei IceFox ODRVM.
